types.html:
RER m (plural RERs)

  1. A commuter rail or overground system, especially one with relatively high speeds and widely-spaced stations in urban areas.
  2. (Switzerland) Conventional translation of German S-Bahn in German-speaking regions of Switzerland, regardless of whether a system would otherwise be classed as an RER.
trans: A commuter rail or overground system, especially one with relatively high speeds and widely-spaced stations in urban areas.
Conventional translation of German S-Bahn in German-speaking regions of Switzerland, regardless of whether a system would otherwise be classed as an RER.
